front.extra:
PRAYER: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India for issuance of
a Writ of Mandamus, to direct the fifth respondent to issue Adangal form under the
Prime Minister crop insurance Scheme to the petitioner and direct the fifth respondent
to register the petitioner's crop insurance application for the year 2019-2020 within
time frame in accordance with the rules and procedures framed under the scheme.
For Petitioner :

Additional Government Pleader
for R.1 to R.5
:

for Mr.C.Ramar
